label: countdown
peekOfCode:
def countdown(t):
    while t:
        mins, secs = divmod(t, 60)
        timer = "{:02d}:{:02d}".format(mins, secs)
        print(timer, end="\r")
        time.sleep(1)
        t -= 1
    print("Countdown done!!")
# input time in seconds
t = input("Enter the time in seconds: ")
